name: WC Disable zoom / lightbox feature in 3.0
author: Rynaldo Stoltz

sections.description: This plugin lets you disable / enable the new product gallery zoom / lightbox features (or both), in WooCommerce 3.0.
sections.installation:
1. Download the plugin & install it to your wp-content/plugins folder (or use the Plugins menu through the WordPress Administration section)
  2. Activate the plugin
  3. Navigate to WooCommerce > Settings > Products > Product gallery options.
  4. Select your option/s.
  5. Save and enjoy!
sections.faq:
Q: Is there an option to disable these features per-product level rather than globally?

A: We are working on this.

Q: Where can I go if I find an issue or want to recommend a feature?

A: You can submit a issues / feature requests on the Public GitHub Repository.
